title: WTB: SLs and HOFs to complete The Monster!
author: Silverskulls

posts.post_title: WTB: SLs and HOFs to complete The Monster!
posts.post_content:
Do you like money? I need a few more cards to complete my Monster and would love to buy the following SLs and HOFs in low grade (A/1/2-preferably raw but slabbed OK). Thanks!

These SLs in any backs:  

  * Hickman  
  * D. Jordan  
  * Perdue  
  * Reagan


And these HOFs in non-P/SC/PB backs:

  * Bender Port  
  * Brown Cubs  
  * Cobb bat on  
  * E. Collins port  
  * Jennings Port  
  * Joss Port  
  * Joss Pitching  
  * Keeler bat  
  * Lajoie throwing  
  * Marquard port  
  * Mathewson white cap  
  * McGraw no cap  
  * Tinker bat on shoulder  
  * Young glove
